scene_description_enriched: The Virgin Mary, depicted with a golden halo, is seated and breastfeeding the Christ Child, who also has a halo. They are within a garden enclosure formed by a trellis covered in roses. Two angels, one on the left and one on the right, stand and offer bowls. The angel on the left wears a purple robe and has white wings, while the angel on the right wears a similar robe and also has white wings. The garden setting includes stylized trees in pots and is bordered by a red brick wall at the base. The entire scene is framed by an arched border decorated with floral motifs and birds.
